question: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life?

steps.content: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life?
Plan: 1) Search for strategies on applying minimalism to digital life. 2) Return the most effective methods.
Searching for strategies to apply minimalism to digital life.

To apply minimalism to your digital life, consider decluttering your digital devices by deleting unused apps, organizing files into folders, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, and setting boundaries for screen time.

To apply minimalism to your digital life, consider decluttering your digital devices by deleting unused apps, organizing files into folders, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, and setting boundaries for screen time.

true_answer: To apply minimalism to your digital life, consider decluttering your digital devices by deleting unused apps, organizing files into folders, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, and setting boundaries for screen time.
